rows.label: tlk00350104_msg0001
rows.name:
You're heading out to Fons Maim
with the boss? Wish I could join you...

rows.label: tlk00350104_msg0002
rows.name:
Fons Maim's a melting pot of culture.
I'd love to join you, catch a few plays...

rows.label: tlk00350104_msg0003
rows.name:
What? You didn't picture me as the
theatergoing type?

rows.label: tlk00350104_msg0004
rows.name:
Anyhow, just make sure you're well
equipped for the journey. Wouldn't
want you to give the Boss any trouble.
